name: Eeriness
description:
You are working Night Shift, in a small clistophobic room.

"Your job is to vanish anomalies that appear in the field that you are working on"

Can you survive the night shift? or let them consume you?

xXx

The Eeriness is a short horror game thats based on the upcoming series named "Places you see in your nightmares"

xXx

*in case of bugs or glitches please report them in the comment section.
